name: Hearts: single & multiplayer
description:
Play Hearts against one of the best Hearts AI or online against other players with rankings. Beautiful animations, fast gameplay and lots of fun!

Additional themed decks of cards are available from:
• New York
• Washington
• New Orleans
• Hawaii

The Standard deck comes from Chris Aguilar:
Vectorized Playing Cards 1.3- http://code.google.com/p/vectorized-playing-cards/
